channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- InventoryPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- InventoryPress

item.title: CVE-2023-2579|2024-08-02T06:26:09.687Z -- unknown -- inventorypress
item.description: The InventoryPress WordPress plugin through 1.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow users with the role of author and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
